text: once upon a time there was a large lake
in the middle of six sky high mountains
the water was a beautiful icy blue and
the mountains were covered with tall
green trees the lake was calm and
peaceful with teeny-tiny waves in the
lake lived an itsy bitsy pinky ponky
little water drop he lived there with
all his friends and all his family all
day alone he played with his friends
Yahoo yipee yeah they would yell as a
splish and splash and had lots of fun at
night before bed the little water drop
would say I love you mommy I love you
daddy
I love you brother I love you sister and
mommy
yes sweep drop mommy would say I love
the lake the little water drop would say
then he would sleep peacefully swaying
with the water back and forth side to
side and up and down
he loved his home and he was happy every
day one day the little water drop woke
up to discover the lake was
roasty-toasty hot the yellow Sun was big
and bright in the blue sky the little
water drop looked up at the Sun it was
bigger and angrier than he had ever seen
he was curious about it so he started
swimming up up up and up to the top of
the lake
whoosh suddenly the little water drop
was not swimming he was floating up into
the sky up up and away he went higher
and higher well the large lake below him
became smaller and smaller he looked up
to see what was happening a big gray
cloud was pulling him up from the lake
pulling him towards the cloud where am I
asked the little water drop you're
inside me said the big grey cloud in a
loud mean voice it was cold and foggy in
the cloud and hard to see the wind was
strong it moved fast and howled like a
wolf I want to go home to the lake said
the scared little water drop mr. cloud
please put me down no said the big gray
cloud meanly you are coming with me stop
let me go mr. mean cloud shouted the
little water drop the big mean cloud did
not reply he flew away moving faster and
faster the wind howled louder and louder
and the little water drop was spun
around and around
squish-squash the big gray cloud moved
quickly across the sky picking up more
and more drops of water it grew bigger
and bigger and darker and darker there
were many more water drops now and the
water drops were squeezed tighter and
tighter it was too crowded inside the
cloud crack suddenly the cloud burst
open lightening shot out of the cloud
and raced down toward the ground then
there was a loud Rumble everything was
shaking follow the lightening down the
Thunder boomed water-drop started to
jump from the cloud the itsy-bitsy
little water drop jump to blush the
little water drop crushed into the big
body of water below this was water but
it was different it tasted salty and
there were really big waves first the
salty water rose really high and then it
sank really low the salty water was deep
and dark giant fish swam all around they
were much bigger than the fish in the
lake
some had amazing colors that the little
water drop had never seen before
wahoo screamed the other drops suddenly
a really big wave scooped him up and
carried him quickly towards the sandy
beach as they got closer to the beach
the wave grew taller and taller he was
scared but the other water drops were
happy
crush the wave came tumbling down and
the little water drop smashed into the
sandy beach he tumbled and turned salt
sand and bubbles were everywhere then he
was resting on the beach things were
calm for a moment when suddenly the
salty water pulled the little water drop
out again another big wave was waiting
and it tried to grab him but he swam
hard he used all of his power to get
away from the big strong waves the
little water drop did not like it here
in the salty water with the big scary
waves the little water drops swam for a
long time he was tired and he wanted to
go home then one day the yellow Sun was
big and bright in the sky again he
remembered he swam up toward the angry
Sun up up and up to the top of the water
then he was floating again up up and up
until he was inside a cloud this cloud
was small white and fluffy inside the
cloud the wind blew gently and it was
calm and peaceful this cloud reminded
him of home and he missed his home
suddenly the water drop started to cry
why are you crying
asked the small white cloud in a soft
gentle voice I miss my home said the
little water drop I want to go there
where is your home asked the small white
cloud the large lake in the mountains he
said the big circle Lake asked the cloud
it is a circle answered the little water
drop it's in the middle of six sky high
mountains a small white cloud exclaimed
I know that Lake I can take you there
thank you thank you said the little
water drop you're a kind cloud let's go
said the small white cloud
whoosh they past buildings planes hills
forests and finally they could see big
tall mountains thank you kind cloud
thank you said the little water drop
you're welcome
said the kind cloud when they reached
the big tall mountains good luck
Geronimo yelled a little water drop the
small white cloud opened up and the
little water drop jumped down he raced
faster and faster the mountains getting
bigger and bigger nothing could stop him
he was going home
smash the little water drop crushed into
the biggest mountain he started to
tumble down the mountain slowly at first
and then faster and faster
crash the little water drop smashed into
a stream of fast-moving water drops and
was picked up and carried away this
water did not taste strange but it moved
fast
the little water drop asked for help but
everyone was moving or talking too fast
and this fast-moving water moved in a
strange direction it went straight but
then suddenly turned left then I went
straight again but then suddenly turn
right
it's Zig zagged and sped down the
mountain he slid over small rocks and
bounced off big rocks the little water
drop could not swim away he could only
move together with everyone else the
other water drops were having so much
fun but he was not
suddenly the fast-moving water slowed
down the water became calm and the
little water drop felt safe he floated
peacefully for a few minutes when he
heard a soft low roar in the distance
the roar grew louder and scarier as he
slowly moved forward the little water
drop looked ahead and saw that the river
suddenly ended he tried to swim the
other way but it was too late he was
pulled slowly toward the end of the
moving water closer and closer until he
could see a big drop the sound of the
falling water was so loud and then the
little water drop went over the
waterfall and was falling down faster
and faster
splash the little water drop crushed
into the water below and was pulled
under he swam hard but more water drops
fell on top of him he swam harder and
finally reached the top of the water the
little water drop was so tired he wanted
to go home and see his mother father
family and friends he took a deep breath
and accidentally gulped some water
YUM what a delicious taste he knew the
taste the water was calm and peaceful
and the waves were teeny-tiny he knew
these waves and then he saw a small red
fish swim by
he knew that fish he was home
that night the itsy-bitsy pinky ponky
little water drop told all of his
friends and family about his adventure
about the big mean cloud the small kind
cloud the salty water and the
fast-moving water he told them the whole
tale
then he hugged his mother father brother
and sister before the little water drop
went to bed he said I love you mommy
I love you daddy I love you brother I
love you sister and mommy yes we drop
mommy asked I love the lake the little
water drop set then he slept long and
well in the water of the lake peacefully
swaying back and forth side to side and
up and down the end
once upon a time there was a large lake
in the middle of six sky high mountains
the water was a beautiful icy blue and
the mountains were covered with tall
green trees but the green leaves turned
to orange and red
outside things were changing each day
was colder and colder and the red and
orange leaves fell from the trees
inside the lake the itsy-bitsy pinky
ponky water drop and his friends were
worried change day was coming
soon they would leave and change
dad I am scared said little water drop
son I was scared too but it was okay
said daddy water drop every water drop
from this lake has to do it
later that day little water drop saw
something falling slowly toward the lake
from the sky he had never seen something
fall so slowly he was curious so little
water drops swam to the surface to see
it was a teeny-tiny shiny little
snowflake Yahoo
shouted the little snowflake falling
slowly back and forth side to side
splash the little snowflake landed in
the lake next to little water drop
suddenly the little snowflake changed
into a water drop I'm back shouted the
little snowflake that was fun change day
is great
little water drop became brave he put on
his helmet
I am ready said the little water drop I
am ready for my change day whoo-hah
so little water drop left the lake up up
and away he went
hello brave little water drop said cold
cloud are you ready to change I I think
so said little water drop a little
worried the cold will change you in five
four three two one
said cold cloud
suddenly a long icicle arm grew from
little water drops left side the change
had started and soon after
little water drop was completely frozen
cold cloud changed his water body into a
beautiful ice crystal little water drop
was now a teeny-tiny shiny white
snowflake
Geronimo yelled little snowflake cold
cloud opened up and little snowflake
jumped he was ready to race towards the
town below faster and faster but
little snowflake didn't fall faster and
faster
he didn't race towards the town below he
floated slowly back and forth side to
side
back and forth side to side falling
slowly finally dizzy little snowflake
landed softly on a pile of snow in a
tree
little snowflake tried to move but he
couldn't little snowflake was worried if
I can't move I will be stuck here for
the whole winter he thought to himself
help he shouted I'm stuck suddenly a
gust of wind picked up little snowflake
and flung him from the tree
he didn't fall fast he glided back and
forth side to side then landed softly on
a pile of snow the wind will move me he
thought
little snowflake relaxed he looked at
the beautiful blue sky resting on the
ground and looking at the sky everything
was calm then suddenly
two giant hands scooped him up from the
ground the hands squished and squeezed
him together with the other snowflakes
then the hands
smashed him into the face of a giant
snowman ouchie shouted little snowflake
he was now part of the snowman and
stayed there for the night
the next day the Sun was bright and the
day was warm
little snowflake became little water
drop again the water drops gathered in a
puddle below
splishing and splashing in the puddle
little water drop thought of the lake it
was time to go home
up up and away
welcome back said cold cloud ready 5 4 3
little water drop changed again but he
was not the same snowflake because no
two snowflakes are the same this time he
was bigger and stronger
myleik said little snowflake I'm home oh
no said cold cloud the lake is frozen
you can't go home
I'm going home said little snowflake I
have an idea
Geronimo yelled little snowflake he
jumped from the cloud and floated fast
down toward the ground
thud little snowflakes slammed into the
mountain everything shook and started to
move
jump with me shouted little snowflake
little snowflakes began to bounce up and
down now everything was shaking and
rumbling suddenly
all the snowflakes started to race down
the mountain went the snow crack went
the trees they were moving so fast as
they raced down the mountain faster and
faster
smash the snow smashed through the ice
and into the water
little snowflake changed back to little
water drop
you're back so soon said his older
brother that was the fastest change day
ever home for the holidays said little
water drop being frozen is fun but I
like being a water drop in our lake
sorry about the mess the end

one day little Ryan got a cat named
sergeant whiskers sergeant whiskers and
little Ryan were best friends at first
sight little Ryan was excited to play
with his new best friend little Ryan
loved to play soccer but sergeant
whiskers didn't little Ryan liked to
play cops and robbers but sergeant
whiskers didn't little Ryan loved to
play catch but sergeant whiskers
couldn't little Ryan like to play Safari
hunt but sergeant whiskers didn't
sergeant whiskers didn't want to play
with little Ryan anymore
so one day sergeant whiskers went away
little Ryan didn't understand and
started to cry why so sad little Ryan
asked mom and dad little Ryan told them
about the games he tried to play with
sergeant whiskers cats don't play that
way little Ryan sergeant whiskers likes
games like these
leaping games where cats jump in the air
chasing feathers you shake hide and seek
games where cats wait and spy for
something to go by
bouncy bouncy games where cats jump and
paw at the things moving under the
covers tangle and tug games where cats
pull and paw at balls of yarn and pet
cats under the chin to hear them purr
little Ryan studied the rules again and
again he waited by the door for sergeant
whiskers to come back and Sergeant
whiskers came back the very next day
little Ryan was so happy little Ryan
said sorry too sergeant whiskers
sergeant whiskers leaped into little
Ryan's arms and hugged him little Ryan
cried tears of joy sergeant whiskers has
fun playing his favorite games with
little Ryan sergeant whiskers and little
Ryan are best friends forever
the end
[Music]
